select
from da_user_contribution where 1 = 1
and id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(add_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginAddTime})
AND unix_timestamp(add_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endAddTime})
and id = #{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND unix_timestamp(update_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginUpdateTime})
AND unix_timestamp(update_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endUpdateTime})
and user_id = #{EntityRelated.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by
${Order.columnName}
ASC
DESC
